mapper.insert: insert into notification_project(project_seq, member_seq, message) values(#{project_seq}, #{member_seq}, #{message})
mapper.select: select * from notification_project where member_seq = #{member_seq} order by notification_date desc
mapper.update: update notification_project set is_read = true where member_seq = #{member_seq} and #{last_notification_seq} >= notification_seq and is_read = false
